justification: The Offering ('The Ring is trying to get back to its master.') and Interfaces ('The pirate captain wore a tricorn hat and an eye patch.') do not mention or demonstrate any interactive or augmented experience, nor do they refer to computer-generated perceptual information or immersive simulation. There is no evidence of meeting the requirement.
ability: The ability to provide an interactive experience of a real-world environment where the objects that reside in the real world are enhanced by computer-generated perceptual information such as visual, auditory, haptic etc.  environment.
